amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language that raises the Community Development Block Grant income eligibility for median household income.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 106-562 to strike language in Title IV that raises the CDBG income eligibility for a median household income and brings it back down to the existing level.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 367 (Roll no. 107).
